EVAS + Bombardier

EVAS is widely adopted on Bombardier Global and Challenger platforms.  It is available as a production upgrade option, as well as an aftermarket upgrade through Bombardier and VisionSafe.

Smoke is the leading cause of
emergency landings for ETOPS

Over 1000 EVAS units installed on Bombardier Aircraft.
An EVAS shipset costs less than the average tank of fuel
Due to smoke, fire, or fumes on the aircraft

Purchase EVAS directly from VisionSafe for under $40,000

What’s Included

  • 2 EVAS units (left and right seats)
  • EVAS installation hardware
  • STC installation drawing
  • 10 year warranty

Installation

  • < 2 hour install on average
  • EVAS can be installed by Bombardier, your MRO provider, or by your in house technician.

Training

  • Simulator based EVAS Training offered by both FlightSafety & CAE
  • EVAS training is also offered at select regional training facilities around the world

Restore pilots’ vision during a blinding smoke in the cockpit incident.

Save the lives of your passengers and crew with EVAS on board.
